data.title: Outstanding theatre and performances
data.text:
"Becky's New Car" was hilarious as they interacted with the audience.  Very friendly, small theatre with comfortable seating.  Excellent parking to the side of the theatre and several restaurants to eat and drink at before or after performances.  

$32 for two tickets.  Well worth it.

data.title: Great Place
data.text: I took my 8 year old to see a kids play here last night and had a great time. I was not aware we had this establishment in our town. Loved the small town feel of the theatre and everyone was so nice. Will definitely attend more plays here

data.title: Beautiful little theatre
data.text: A beautiful small theatre with wonderful shows. Very intimate with the audience due to size. Nice location and easy parking. Tickets are very reasonable.

data.title: First Class Community Theatre
data.text: We have attended many productions at HART and I have even acted in a half dozen or so.  It may not be professional theatre but my wife and I have witnessed some very professional quality acting.  As in all CT's, it takes a huge time commitment for the volunteers that make it happen.  The community's support is vital!  Give them a try, you won't be sorry.

data.title: Hometown Talent Shines
data.text: We have been season ticket holders for the last 3 years and are appreciative of the hard work and talent that the cast and crew of the Hart Theatre regularly demonstrate.  This is not professional theatre but the effort they put out makes all the difference.  This cozy setting is inexpensive entertainment in need of your community support.
